name: v1_music_posts_music_id
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool tokapi_mobile_version.
Tool description: Highly available tiktok **mobile** API. We are doing our best for make your life easy.Bigger API plans and **additional functionality** are available on request.  Feel free to contact us on Telegram: [https://t.me/somjik_tokapi](https://t.me/somjik_tokapi) #tiktok #tik #tok #tik-tok #video #music #user #feed #hashtag #challenge #trending #trend #comments #comment #image #photo #media #search #scrapper #grabber
API description: Fetches posts associated with a specific music ID from the Tokapi API.

music_id.description: Unique identifier for the music whose posts are to be fetched.

offset.description: The starting point for the set of results to be fetched. Used for paginated responses. Defaults to 0.

count.description: The number of results to return in the response. Defaults to 20.
